ch.ethz.csb.youscope.client.addon
Interface YouScopeClientConnection

public interface YouScopeClientConnection

Interface through which an addon can access the client.

Author:
langmo

Method Summary
 YouScopeFrame createFrame()
          Creates a new content window.
 JobConfigurationAddonFactory getJobAddon(java.lang.String addonID)
          Returns the job addon with the given ID, or null if this addon is unknown.

          Returns all known job addons.

          Returns true if the microscope is connected to this computer, and false, if the microscope is on a different computer.

Method Detail

getProperties

YouScopeProperties getProperties()
Returns an interface through which an addon can save properties as well as access the properties of the YouScope client.

Returns:
Interface to save and load properties.

createFrame

YouScopeFrame createFrame()
Creates a new content window. The content window is usually a JFrame or a JInternalFrame.

Returns:
New Frame.

java.lang.Iterable<JobConfigurationAddonFactory> getJobAddons()
Returns all known job addons.

getJobAddon

JobConfigurationAddonFactory getJobAddon(java.lang.String addonID)
Returns the job addon with the given ID, or null if this addon is unknown.

Parameters:
addonID - The ID of the addon.
Returns:
A factory to create the addon, or null if the addon ID is unknown.

A factory to create the addon, or null if the addon ID is unknown.

getToolIDsWithFunctionality

java.lang.String[] getToolIDsWithFunctionality(java.lang.String functionality)
Returns a list of tool IDs of the tool addons which support a given functionality. Returns an empty array if not tool supports the queried functionality.

Parameters:
functionality - String defining (in a case independent manner) the functionality.
Returns:
Array of tool IDs which have the queried functionality.

sendError

void sendError(java.lang.String message,
               java.lang.Throwable error)
Notifies the client that an error occurred, such that the client can notify the user in the client specific way.

Parameters:
message - Description of the error.
error - The error.

sendError

void sendError(java.lang.String message)
Notifies the client that an error occurred, such that the client can notify the user in the client specific way.

Parameters:
message - Description of the error.

sendMessage

void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
Sends a human readable message to the client, which (may) be displayed to the user in the client specific way.

Parameters:
message - The message to send to the client.

isLocalServer

boolean isLocalServer()
Returns true if the microscope is connected to this computer, and false, if the microscope is on a different computer.

Returns:
True if the microscope is connected to this computer, and false, if the microscope is on a different computer.

getScriptEngineFactories

java.lang.Iterable<javax.script.ScriptEngineFactory> getScriptEngineFactories()
Returns all script engine factories supported by the client.

Returns:
Iterable through all script engines.

getScriptEngineFactory

javax.script.ScriptEngineFactory getScriptEngineFactory(java.lang.String engineName)
Returns a script engine factory with the given name. Remark: engine names are case sensitive.

Parameters:
engineName - The name of the script engine factory. Same as factory.getEngineName().
Returns:
script engine factory for given name, or null, if no script engine is supported for the given name.
